cause.description:
Part of City University in London, Cass is a business school with a truly international perspective. An environment created for learning, not teaching. A place where students, academics, industry experts, business leaders and policy makers can share ideas, and enrich each other's thinking. Cass offers undergraduate, MSc, MBA and PhD courses as well as Executive Education. We excel in cutting-edge research for businesses in London and around the world.
1. We believe in delivering teaching, research and consulting of the highest standards to the communities we serve.
cause.mission: Cass Business school is the intellectual hub of the City of London.
cause.name: Cass Business School
